edu.berkeley.compbio.sequtils.sequencereader

Interface SectionList

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SequenceReader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FastaParser, FilteringSectionList, RandomSectionList

    public interface SectionList
extends SequenceReader
    A list of sequence fragments, represented only by their metadata.
    Version:
    $Id: SectionList.java 1246 2009-10-09 23:29:26Z soergel $
    Author:
    David Soergel

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SequenceFragmentMetadata getRootMetadata() 
      SequenceFragmentMetadata next()
      Iterates through the list of sections in order.
      SequenceFragmentMetadata nextShuffled()
      Iterates through the list of sections in random order, providing each section exactly once
      SequenceFragmentMetadata randomSectionFragment()
      Get a random section fragment (really just the start position, with no length specified), selected uniformly (nucleotidewise) from all available sequence.
      SequenceFragmentMetadata randomSectionLengthWeighted()
      Get a random section from the list, selected uniformly from the complete sections in the list, weighted by their lengths.
      SequenceFragmentMetadata randomSectionUniform()
      Get a random section from the list, selected uniformly from the complete sections in the list, ignoring their lengths.
      void reset()
      reset the stream to the beginning.

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.berkeley.compbio.sequtils.SequenceReader

        close, getName, getTotalSequence, read, read, readTranslated, seek, seek, setTranslationAlphabet

      • randomSectionFragment

        @NotNull
SequenceFragmentMetadata randomSectionFragment()
                                               throws NotEnoughSequenceException,
                                                      IOException
        Get a random section fragment (really just the start position, with no length specified), selected uniformly (nucleotidewise) from all available sequence. Note this should not first select a random Section, since sections of different lengths may thereby produce biased results.
        Throws:
        NotEnoughSequenceException
        IOException

      • randomSectionLengthWeighted

        SequenceFragmentMetadata randomSectionLengthWeighted()
                                                     throws NotEnoughSequenceException,
                                                            IOException
        Get a random section from the list, selected uniformly from the complete sections in the list, weighted by their lengths. Effectively, choose a randomSectionFragment(), i.e. a random position nucleotidewise, and then return the Section in which that position is found.
        Throws:
        NotEnoughSequenceException
        IOException

      • randomSectionUniform

        SequenceFragmentMetadata randomSectionUniform()
                                              throws IOException
        Get a random section from the list, selected uniformly from the complete sections in the list, ignoring their lengths.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getRootMetadata

        SequenceFragmentMetadata getRootMetadata()
